metadata.name: Kerberos Manipulation
metadata.comment: Detects failed Kerberos TGT issue operation. This can be a sign of manipulations of TGT messages by an attacker.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in (675, 4768, 4769, 4771)) AND (lower(LOWER(status_code)) in ('0x9', '0xa', '0xb', '0xf', '0x10', '0x11', '0x13', '0x14', '0x1a', '0x1f', '0x21', '0x22', '0x23', '0x24', '0x26', '0x27', '0x28', '0x29', '0x2c', '0x2d', '0x2e', '0x2f', '0x31', '0x32', '0x3e', '0x3f', '0x40', '0x41', '0x43', '0x44')))

output.summary: Detects failed Kerberos TGT issue operation. This can be a sign of manipulations of TGT messages by an attacker.

metadata.objective: False positive: Faulty legacy applications Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-10/security/threat-protection/auditing/event-4771
